title: Help Needed
body:
Hi guys descendit here,
i was re downloading lol on a different computer and whenever i try to open lol the " League of Legends" sign pops up for a second or two then it disappears  and it doesn't pop up at all, any help I've tried re downloading 2 times and running as admin. 
thank you descendit.

replies.body:
There's a lot of personal information in that screenshot, I suggest you take it down.

I've also been getting this problem since this morning. I think the servers are stuffed atm.
